description: The Devold® Sørisen Sweater is a new and updated version of the original Norwegian sweater, Nordsjø. The preppy look that inspired L.L. Bean to create the iconic sweater is even enhanced here. Made from 100% pure new wool, it is thinner, softer and more lightweight than the original. The colours are slightly dimmed and the distance added to the distinctive chevron check pattern gives it a more minimalistic look. Classic flat-knit sweater in two colours. Comfortable ribbed bottom of the sleeves and body.
name: Devold Sorisen Wool Sweater - Unisex
